body_html: I think this can be closed. For the record, I ended up finding even a better way of loading pre-trained embeddings this by using tf.contrib.layers.embed_sequence and passing in a custom initializer.
body_text: I think this can be closed. For the record, I ended up finding even a better way of loading pre-trained embeddings this by using tf.contrib.layers.embed_sequence and passing in a custom initializer.
body: I think this can be closed. For the record, I ended up finding even a better way of loading pre-trained embeddings this by using `tf.contrib.layers.embed_sequence` and passing in a custom initializer.
